features: Combining dual-layered, stainless steel bars without compromising durability, Kahtoola’s LeafSpring® Flex Bar won’t break under added stress like most conventional crampons on the market. Designed to flex naturally with the foot and any type of footwear, it allows users to move fast and light over non-technical terrain, and will last a lifetime
tech_specs.\u2022 Care Instructions: Wash with lukewarm water and air-dry (do NOT dry with heat). Ensure the product is clean and dry before storage. Inspect before each use
